name: Response Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook outlines the automated response to an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts on a compromised server.

action--b8008b75-d7e1-41ab-bc63-d00d74f2.name: Kill malicious process
action--b8008b75-d7e1-41ab-bc63-d00d74f2.description: Terminate any processes that are running the malicious script.

action--e0920845-b308-4436-a009-a80e720e.name: Block IP and notify team
action--e0920845-b308-4436-a009-a80e720e.description: Block the suspicious IP that initiated the attack and notify the security team.

commands.command: iptables -A INPUT -s suspicious.ip.address -j DROP; echo 'Suspicious IP has been blocked.' | mail -s 'Security Alert' team@example.com

action--d2b3f8e3-0f12-4aef-b501-4c82a18e.name: Run a security scan
action--d2b3f8e3-0f12-4aef-b501-4c82a18e.description: Perform a security scan on the affected directory and repeat until the scan is clean.

loop--d2b3f8e3-0f12-4aef-b501-4c82a18ecf.name: Repeat security scan until clean
loop--d2b3f8e3-0f12-4aef-b501-4c82a18ecf.description: Iterate the security scan until it is confirmed clean.

attack_detected.description: Variable indicating whether an attack was detected based on logs.

scan_result.description: Result of the last security scan.
